body:
### Problem

Information on the cache directory and its corresponding environment variable (`$XDG_CACHE_HOME`) is missing from the [Standard Paths documentation](https://neovim.io/doc/user/starting.html#standard-path). It was when I was verifying that I had properly relocated all of my Neovim files through the usage of [`stdpath("cache")`](https://neovim.io/doc/user/builtin.html#stdpath()) that I realized that information regarding the cache directory was not provided. I had to use a [third party website](https://vi.stackexchange.com/questions/21824/how-to-control-cache-folder-location) to resolve my issue due to the cache folder not being properly documented.

If possible, information on the corresponding directories and environment variables of `stdpath("config_dirs")`, `stdpath("data_dirs")`, and `stdpath("log")` should also be provided in the [Standard Paths documentation](https://neovim.io/doc/user/starting.html#standard-path).

### Expected behavior

Information of the cache directory and its corresponding environment variable ($XDG_CACHE_HOME) should be present in the [Standard Paths documentation](https://neovim.io/doc/user/starting.html#standard-path). Information on the corresponding directories and environment variables of `stdpath("config_dirs")`, `stdpath("data_dirs")`, and `stdpath("log")` are also not present as well.
title: Cache Directory and other Standard Paths Information Missing From Standard Paths Documentation
